name: Local-File-Organizer (QiuYannnn)
description: [项目级] An AI-powered file management tool that ensures privacy by organizing local texts, images. Using Llama3.2 3B and Llava v1.6 models with the Nexa SDK, it intuitively scans, restructures, and organizes files for quick, seamless access and easy retrieval.。来源: https://github.com/QiuYannnn/Local-File-Organizer

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
An AI-powered file management tool that ensures privacy by organizing local texts, images. Using Llama3.2 3B and Llava v1.6 models with the Nexa SDK, it intuitively scans, restructures, and organizes files for quick, seamless access and easy retrieval.

来源: https://github.com/QiuYannnn/Local-File-Organizer
语言: Python
Stars: 3132

genes.title: 安装与快速开始
genes.content: > For SDK installation and model-related issues, please post on [here](https://github.com/NexaAI/nexa-sdk/issues).
